name: CP-54
details:
"The Big Orange" OverdriveCaline's CP-54 The Big Orange overdrive is exactly what it says it is. Big and Orange. Well it's not big in size. But in sound. Like the crispy pant fluttering kind of power of an Orange amp turned up.
Whether you want light grit or full on distortion, loads of tone with lots of string clarity that doesn't drop out as you turn it up.
Sustain, Volume, Attack Controls
True Bypass
Super Solid Metal Casing
Uses 9V Battery (with included battery clip) or Standard Boss Style Adapter (not included)
Brand: Caline
Weight: 0.8 lb
